blog.description: Alice. 22. I channel my sad energy into reader inserts for TV/film Characters. Currently ACCEPTING requests. Masterlist

title: Tea Parties and Test Flights
body:
Requested by me: You and Carol had been friends since you were little and you invite her around for a very specific walk down memory lane. Surprising her with a fort. 

Pairing: Carol Danvers x fem!reader

Words: 945

A/N - Two posts in one day, who is she?? I wrote this when Captain Marvel first came out and just never posted it so… it’s a little soft imo. I have also temporarily opened my requests again

“I’m looking.”

“No!” You yell back quickly. “Just keep your eyes covered, we’re almost there.”

“I’ve seen your room before, Y/N.” Your hand was in hers as you lead the blonde inside your bedroom, closing the door behind the two of you. You drop her hand, glancing around to make sure you hadn’t forgotten anything before turning on your heel to face her.  A bright smile on full display. “Now you can look.”

You watch for her reaction as her eyes settle on your set up. Watching an equally bright smile spread over her lips. You had been friends with Carol since you were little; You grew up together. After everything that happened between her becoming a pilot and her apparent accident, there was nothing that warmed your heart more than finally getting to see her again. It was almost too hard to believe but you were so happy to see her. You started hanging out a lot since she reappeared. You wanted to remind her of the times you used to spend together when you were little and so you had spent all morning setting this up. Grabbing blankets and sheets from around your house, cushions, and fairy lights.

“Do you remember when we were little and we used to sneak up here-”

“and build a fort out of everything we could find- I do. This is amazing. Y/N.”

“It’s just a fort-” You wave your hand dismissfully but with a smirk on your lips. “now come,” You announce eagerly, grabbing the sheet you pull it back for the entrance. Bowing your head a little “After you, my lady.”

“How chivalrous.” The blonde smiled softly before walking over and ducking inside. You followed her in. You had tried to make it as spacious as possible and for the most part, you were successful. You could fit two grown women inside but it was just a tad cramped. She sat down and you sat down next to her. You grabbed a tray you had stashed away earlier and placed it between you two. On it was two teacups. two teapots. and a biscuit tin.

“You brought me in here to have… a tea party?”

“By all means, fly the plane but you gotta take a break sometime.” Carol has always been a rough and tumble kind of girl. You could relate but you’d also never say no to food. She chuckled, shaking her head slowly.

“I really used to pretend I was flying a plane huh?”

You nod. “I was always along for the ride except for that time where things got a bit wild and you almost dropped me.”

“Not my fault.” Carol insisted.

“It was definitely your fault.”

“Your imaginary accidents are your own fault.” She teased and you just rolled your eyes. Deciding to drop the topic, you signal to the tray before you.

“May I offer you a beverage, Miss Danvers?”

“What do you have?” She asks.

“Imaginary tea.” You reply, pointing to one teapot and then to the other. “Or coffee.”

“Tea please.” She answered. you picked up the teapot and poured out the “imaginary” tea. you could have made actual tea but that ruined the experience and you wanted it to be authentic to your childhood. You were never allowed to use real tea because it was hot and you had a habit of making a mess so the chances of you burning yourself were pretty high. The tea was just water. The coffee was wine. When you were younger you used juice instead of wine.

“Do you remember what happened the last time we did this? We were past the age of tea parties and test flights.”

She shook her head. Picking up her cup, she took a sip of water. “What happened?”

“I was pissed off about something; I don’t even remember what and you came over trying to cheer me up.”

“Did I do a good job?” Carol asks looking to you with curious eyes.

You shook your head. “You freaked out actually and that was probably the last time I saw you before you left and made new friends and completely forget about me.”

“I could never forget about you, Y/N-”

“I kissed you,” You admitted after a moment. She seemed a little surprised but her expression quickly softened again.

“So that’s why I’m here,” Carol asks a small but noticeable smirk on her lips.

“What do you mean?” You ask, brows furrowing.

“You brought me here expecting a kiss.”

Face flushed, your head shook rigorously. hands waving in front of you  "No-no, I just, I thought this was cute. It- It has nothing to do with that.“

"I mean if it’s expected then…”

“No. I didn’t- I don’t mean- Carol stop teasing me.”

She laughed playfully, blue eyes on you. Leaning in slowly, she gently placed her lips against yours. It was unexpected and brief. Over before you knew it.

“Gotta fulfill my duty.” She stated firing a two finger salute in your direction. There was a short silence and then Carol piped back up. “Now I could do with a biscuit if you’re offering.”

Frozen for a moment, she smirked. Clicking her fingers before you. “Y/N?”

“What? Yeah, sure.” You pulled open the tin and held it out for her.

“Thank you. This was really cute by the way. Not what expected when you said come to my bedroom but still nice.” She pulled out a chocolate chip cookie.

“What were you thinking?”

Carol just smirked, taking a bite.
“Oh! Fuck.”

“Yeah.”

“Carol Danvers you are a piece of work.”

“And yet you love me.”

I nodded. “Best friends forever and all that shit.”

"I mean if it’s expected then…”

title: What I've Been Reading: April 14, 2019
body:
What I’ve Been Reading: April 14, 2019

This is a bit of a heavy week for What I’ve been Reading. But sometimes, getting serious is necessary. Let’s talk about cultural criticism and drug-resistant germs, shall we? (An odd pairing, I know.) (more…)

title: #amreading 4/14/19: A-Force: Hypertime
body:
#amreading 4/14/19: A-Force: Hypertime

A-Force is an all-female team of Marvel superheroes that originated on Battleworld during the Secret Wars comic event. This is the first collection of A-Force issues as a stand-alone comic.

(more…)

View On WordPress

(more…)

View On WordPress

trail.content_raw:
#amreading 4/14/19: A-Force: Hypertime

title: Good Old Fashioned Lover Boy
body:
Summary: Y/n comes home tired from work. Luckily her girlfriend and some good music cheers her up.

Pairing: Carol Danvers x fem! reader

Warning: lots of fluff!

A/n: not requested. I have no requests so I did another Captain Marvel fic for the gays, enjoy :)

Song used: Good Old Fashioned Lover Boy by Queen

Y/n sighed loudly as she returned home. She exhausted after a long day at work. 

She could hear the faint sound of music playing from the kitchen. Y/n followed the sound to see her girlfriend in a hoodie and pajama pants. She had just made dinner.

Y/n smiled wildly and put her arms around Carol. Carol jumped and turned to see Y/n. She grabbed onto her in a tight hug and left a wet kiss on her cheek.

“You look so tired sweety,” Carol said softly brushing her hand through Y/n’s hair. Y/n sighed and rested her forehead on Carol’s. “It’s just work.”

As Carol opened her mouth to speak piano notes filled the air. 

I can dim the light and sing you songs, full of sad things. 

We can do the tango just for two

Carol looked her girlfriend in the eye and smiled wide.

“Show me how to dance,” Carol whispered into Y/n’s ear. 

I can serenade and gently play on your heart strings,

Be your Valentino just for you

Y/n looked at her concerned, “Are you sure? To this song?”

Carol nodded eagerly.

As the drums kicked in Y/n put her arm on Carol’s waist and intertwined their fingers with her other hand. Carol got the hint and gently placed her hand on Y/n’s shoulder.

Ooh love, ooh lover boy, what’re you doing tonight?

Hey boy

They began gliding their feet across the kitchen floor to the beat of the music. 

“When we’re waltzing we move in a square,” Y/n stated guiding Carol.

Set my alarm, turn on my charm

That’s because I’m a good old fashioned lover boy!

Carol smiled, in awe of her talented girlfriend. 

Y/n grinned back at her and nuzzled their noses together.

Ooh let me feel your heartbeat

(grow faster,faster)

Carol put her head on Y/n’s chest listening to her heartbeat. Y/n rested her head on top.

The two swayed around the room for the duration of the song. Y/n hummed along to the tune the whole way through.

“I want to stay like this forever,” Carol whispered.

Y/n kissed her head. “I love you so much, do you know that?”

Carol laughed, “Oh really? You never told me.”

Y/n giggled. “You’re my lover boy.”

title: Shazam Incorrect Quotes
body:
Billy in Shazam form: What’s wrong with you?

Freddy: What’s wrong with me? What’s wrong with me is that you’re freakishly tall! I feel like a woodland creature.

title: Shazam Incorect Quotes
body:
the kids break into a house to save Eugine, who had been kidnapped to find him perfectly fine
Eugine: :I have slowly, methodically, been building up a tolerance to chloroform over the last three years
Mary: why?
Eugine: for a time like this Mary
Pedro: I don’t believe it… it must have been some other kind of chemical.
*Pedro picks up a handkerchief, sniffs it, and immediately passes out
Billy: Great, now I have to carry 2 guys out of here
